description.value:
Relic of the First Tyrannic War (Ultramarines). Bearer gains Fearless Talent and +20 to any opposed test made against Tyranids. If the character is a squad leader, they passes these benefits on to any other Ultramarines in their Squad.

Requirements

Ultramarines only

Effect: Distinguished

Notes: 25 R
